content.rendered:
Version 1.3.2 is a minor bugfix release.

We have fixed the following bugs:

  • Fix undoing scale fade threshold values, was causing “node is null” error
    message in console and stopping program operation.
  • Fix erroneous rendering of layers with high radius or star curve values in
    Safari browser.
  • Fix incorrect rendering of cloud saved thumbnails when scene contains high
    radius star or curve values.

In version 1.3.1 the following bug was fixed:

  •  Fix the color restoring functionality not to reset color hue when resetting
    color.
